scripts.build:variables: node-sass variables.scss variables.css --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 && postcss -r variables.css
scripts.build:variables-child-theme: node-sass variables.scss sass/child-theme/variables.css --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 && postcss -r sass/child-theme/variables.css
scripts.build:variables-editor: node-sass variables-editor.scss variables-editor.css --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 && postcss -r variables-editor.css
scripts.build:variables-editor-child-theme: node-sass variables-editor.scss sass/child-theme/variables-editor.css --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 && postcss -r sass/child-theme/variables-editor.css
scripts.build:style: node-sass style.scss style.css --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 && postcss -r style.css
scripts.build:style-editor: node-sass style-editor.scss style-editor.css --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 && postcss -r style-editor.css
scripts.build:woocommerce: node-sass style-woocommerce.scss style-woocommerce.css --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 && postcss -r style-woocommerce.css
scripts.build:print: node-sass print.scss print.css --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 && postcss -r print.css
